author: CharlieTheFunEngine
title: TinyTurbosCityAndToyStory Reviews Episode 29: Big Bentley Bust Out
review:
Big Bentley Bust Out is the only set in which you can get The Queen and Miles Axlerod. Miles Axlerod would have to be my favourite from the set.

Building Experience:

The vehicles are fun to build, but the tower is incredibly boring and repetitive.

Parts:

Lots of parts that are new to my collection, not least a heap of tan parts.

Playability:

OK. You can shoot Finn out of the top level of the tower, open the doors in the bottom so Professor Z can leave and winch Mater up the side.

Value for Money:

Far too expensive! AUD$129 is not good enough, outrageous in fact!

Overall:

Nice cars, boring tower. Enough said.

author: Trueblox
title: big bentley bust out - a really good set!
review:
Box/Instructions

the box art looks just fine, showing all the stuffs you can do, and the set comes with 2 instruction booklets, and the box is HUGE!

Parts

there are A LOT of parts. i mean, A LOT!

Minifigures

there are a total of 7 " minifigures ". well, they are not really, they are mostly cars. holly shiftwell can change its sides to wings, professor Z's monocle can move, and the cars can stick on the crane. 

The build

the build is really long. it took me 2 hours to build this. of course, i did some breaks too. but i liked building the big ben!

The completed model

the completed model looks amazing. the big ben is good for any city you build. and the cars are good for just - regular cars you can interact with.

Overall opinion

this set is really good, comes with a lot of pieces, a lot of cars and a heck of a big building. so, i recommend it to any lego and cars series fan!
